function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lower RH leading to longer suspension of droplets and deposition in lower respiratory tract","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory tract infection and transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Use of humidifiers to increase indoor humidity and reduce suspension time of droplets","Technologies":"Humidifiers","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Effects of evaporation on chemistry of droplets affecting virus stability","Impact":"Potential for increased virus viability and transmission through aerosols","Mitigation":"Monitoring and controlling indoor air quality to minimize conditions conducive to virus stability in droplets","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, ventilation control systems","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Formation of protein aggregates and spatial gradients in pH in concentrated droplets","Impact":"Potential for virus decay and inactivation, but exact mechanism is not known","Mitigation":"Research and study to understand the exact mechanism of virus inactivation in concentrated droplets","Technologies":"Laboratory equipment for droplet analysis, research facilities","People":"Research scientists, virologists","Owner":"Research institutions, government research agencies"}]}
